title: [LFM] Western Australian Players.
body:
Are you free to play on weeknights from 7pm? are you dedicated to ranked in season 6? we are looking for team members to fill our roster. 
Must be active, and be wanting to play competitively. 
We need fill ins for each roles. as we have all positions, but in order to ensure we have a full roster, we need alternate lane members.
So we will need players whom would be willing to fill these roles:
Top, Mid, Jungle, Support, ADC.

The reason why we are asking for 5 players, is for scrims, and training, or in case some isn't available on the day, as you know life gets in the way. 

We do muck around, for fun ARAMS occasionally, and try have fun. 

Please add myself in game or WOOF Koharuai. 
Rank isn't essential, but a good attitude is necessary, team players and people who want to progress together as a team. 
Must be in perth if possible, so we can do meet ups, for strategies & meetings and RFlans and other such events
